dhd3_x0040_DL026.defaultvalues: ,,,=select ten_ts from MCC where so_the_ts=@[so_the_ts],,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,=select ton_tt from tontucthoi where ma_vt='[ma_vt]' and ma_kho ='[ma_kho]' and ma_tt1 ='[ma_tt1]' and ma_tt2 ='[ma_tt2]' and ma_tt3 ='[ma_tt3]' and ma_tt4 ='[ma_tt4]' and ma_tt5 ='[ma_tt5]'![so_the_ts],,=exec get_giaban_buon @[ma_vt]%p @[ma_dvt]%p @M[ma_kh]%p@M[ty_gia]%p@[ma_tt1]%p@[ma_tt2]%p@[ma_tt3]%p@[ma_tt4]%p@[ma_tt5]![so_the_ts]![so_the_ts],=[gia_ban_nt]*{ty_gia},=[sl_nhap]*[gia_ban_nt],=[tien_nt]*{ty_gia} ![sl_nhap]![gia_ban]![gia_ban_nt],,131111,5311,,,,,,,=[tien_nt]*[thue_suat]/100![gia_ban_nt]![sl_nhap]![ma_thue],=[tien_thue_nt]*{ty_gia} ![tien]![thue_suat]![gia_ban_nt]![gia_ban]![sl_nhap]![ma_thue],1,,=[gia_von_nt] ![pn_gia_tb],=[gia_von_nt]*[sl_nhap] ![pn_gia_tb],=[tien_nhap_nt] ![sl_nhap]![gia_von_nt]![pn_gia_tb],= exec get_tk_vt @M[ma_dvcs]%p@[ma_kho]%p@[ma_vt],6321,
